mapper.select: SELECT FILE.FILE_SEQ AS fileSeq , FILE.FILE_REF_TB AS fileRefTb , FILE.FILE_REF_COL AS fileRefCol , FILE.FILE_REF_SEQ AS fileRefSeq , FILE.FILE_GB_CD AS fileGbCd , FILE.FILE_ORD_ORDER AS fileOrdOrder , FILE.FILE_ORG_NM AS fileOrgNm , FILE.FILE_REAL_NM AS fileRealNm , FILE.FILE_REAL_PATH AS fileRealPath , CONCAT('/v1/file/download/', FILE.FILE_SEQ) AS fileDownloadUri , FILE.DEL_YN AS delYn , DATE_FORMAT(FILE.REG_DT, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s") AS regDt , REG_USER.USER_NM AS regNm FROM TB_FILE FILE LEFT JOIN TB_USER REG_USER ON FILE.REG_SEQ = REG_USER.USER_SEQ WHERE FILE.FILE_REF_TB = 'TB_NOTICE' AND FILE.FILE_REF_COL = 'NOTICE_SEQ' AND FILE.FILE_REF_SEQ = #{noticeSeq} ORDER BY FILE.FILE_ORD_ORDER
mapper.sql: SELECT NOTI.NOTICE_SEQ AS noticeSeq , NOTI.COMP_SEQ AS compSeq , COMP.COMP_NM AS compNm , NOTI.TITLE AS title , NOTI.CONTENT AS content , NOTI.FIXED_TOP_YN AS fixedTopYn , NOTI.MAIN_TOP_YN AS mainTopYn , NOTI.VIEW_CNT AS viewCnt , NOTI.DEL_YN AS delYn , DATE_FORMAT(NOTI.REG_DT, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s") AS regDt , REG_USER.USER_NM AS regNm , DATE_FORMAT(NOTI.UPDT_DT, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s") AS updtDt , UPDT_USER.USER_NM AS updtNm FROM TB_NOTICE NOTI LEFT JOIN TB_COMPANY COMP ON NOTI.COMP_SEQ = COMP.COMP_SEQ LEFT JOIN TB_USER REG_USER ON NOTI.REG_SEQ = REG_USER.USER_SEQ LEFT JOIN TB_USER UPDT_USER ON NOTI.UPDT_SEQ = UPDT_USER.USER_SEQ WHERE NOTI.DEL_YN = 'N'
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(NOTI.NOTICE_SEQ) FROM TB_NOTICE NOTI LEFT JOIN TB_COMPANY COMP ON NOTI.COMP_SEQ = COMP.COMP_SEQ WHERE NOTI.DEL_YN = 'Y'
AND NOTI.TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') OR NOTI.CONTENT LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') OR COMP.COMP_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%')
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_NOTICE SET VIEW_CNT = VIEW_CNT + 1 WHERE NOTICE_SEQ = #{noticeSeq}
